title: Automotive Paintless Dent Repair (PDR) Technician
summary: For a quick application text APPLY1 to 82174. Dent Wizard is the nation's undisputed leader in automotive reconditioning.
description: You will perform PDR on vehicles, ensure quality standards, and work with clients. Requirements: 2+ years PDR experience, valid driver’s license, attention to detail.

title: Licensed Practical Nurse LPN – Sign on Bonus
summary: Join the Leadership Team at Nazareth Health & Rehab!
description: Provide patient care under RN supervision. Requirements: LPN license, patient-first mindset, ability to work shifts.
